Excited For Something New

Playing now: STIR IT UP by Bob Marley and The Wailers
Dinner tonight: Leftover lentil curry

We've revamped the iTICKER website - nothing special, no sequined nipple tassels, just a little smoothing out of some lumpy bits and throwing out of the old logo.

There really are no pitfalls to doing this. It's not like we're the internet startup equivalent of Gap (we don't employ children for starters). Basically, who'll know?

The result, we think, is understated and inoffensive. Here are some brands that didn't do so well as that:

Logo Design Gone Wrong - 10 Offbeat Examples

While we were at it, we also added 'retweet' and 'reply' buttons to the iTICKER twitter module. Visitors to your sites can now scroll through and pause your tweets too (just hover over a tweet to pause).
